      • getAlpha

        public int getAlpha()
        Gets the current alpha value for the drawable. 0 means fully transparent, 255 means fully opaque. This method is implemented by Drawable subclasses and the value returned is specific to how that class treats alpha. The default return value is 255 if the class does not override this method to return a value specific to its use of alpha.
        Overrides:
        getAlpha in class android.graphics.drawable.Drawable

      • setTint

        public void setTint(int tint)
        Specifies a tint for this drawable.

        Setting a color filter via setColorFilter(ColorFilter) overrides tint.

        Overrides:
        setTint in class android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
        Parameters:
        tint - Color to use for tinting this drawable
